page.title: 18Attitudes People of Penn
page.content: People's attitudes around here are very pleasant. If you are new they make you feel welcome. The people are very generous, for example if you want to borrow some sugar or some milk you could go round next door and ask your neighbour and they would give you what you want. Some people are very old and they need help so the people who are young help the old. There might be the odd old man who might have a go at you if you play near his house but all the rest of the people are nice. Some people are not very nice because if you go up to them and ask them if they want you to go to the shops for them or do anything for them they would say no. Afterwards they would start moaning that no-one does anything for them. Everyone else is very nice.
